name: Bundle.entry.search.score
title: Bundle.entry.search.score
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: When searching, the server's search ranking score for the entry.
element.comment:
Servers are not required to return a ranking score. 1 is most relevant, and 0 is least relevant. Often, search results are sorted by score, but the client may specify a different sort order.

See [Patient Match](patient-operation-match.html) for the EMPI search which relates to this element.
